posts.post_content: Hold on a second. Tezzeret here can make your artifacts into 5/5 creatures. [Sarkhan the Mad](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sarkhan the Mad) can turn creatures of yours into 5/5 dragons with flying. Tezzeret is UB, Sarkhan is RB, and [Nicol Bolas, Planeswalker](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Nicol Bolas, Planeswalker) is UBR. I think there's a very weird deck idea here. Slow and ineffective, yes, but it'd be Nicol Bolas and his major underlings. Tezzeret and Sarkhan make your stuff into nice 5/5 bodies, then Nicol Bolas eventually comes out and wrecks shop. This will never work, but I have to try it.

posts.post_content:
Interestingly, that second ability is one of the set's best answers to [Blightsteel Colossus](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Blightsteel Colossus), if you also have some infect you can block with.  
  
The first ability is basically an [Ancient Stirrings](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ancient Stirrings) that can't fetch land (unless you're playing with colored artifacts from older sets) but still seems like a pretty decent combo enabler.
posts.html:
Interestingly, that second ability is one of the set's best answers to Blightsteel Colossus, if you also have some infect you can block with.

posts.post_content:
How to turn Tezzeret into a 5/5 flying dragon:  
  
Step 1. Use Liquid Metal Coating to turn Tezzeret into an artifact.  
Step 2. Use Tezzeret's ability to turn himself into a 5/5 artifact creature.  
Step 3. Use Sarkhan's ability to turn Tezzeret into a 5/5 dragon!
posts.html:
How to turn Tezzeret into a 5/5 flying dragon:

Step 1. Use Liquid Metal Coating to turn Tezzeret into an artifact.
Step 2. Use Tezzeret's ability to turn himself into a 5/5 artifact creature.
Step 3. Use Sarkhan's ability to turn Tezzeret into a 5/5 dragon!

Posted By: DacenOctavio (3/27/2011 3:18:45 AM)

posts.post_content:
Great card for artifacts in general and gives more power to infect.  
  
Another great thing is that renders equipments null, since if they become a 5/5 and fall from creature and can't equip again.  
  
His ultimate is not a bomb, which makes him less interesting. I think he is better than [Sarkhan the Mad](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sarkhan the Mad) while focusing on the same areas: Card advantage, creature creating, burn  
  
All in all a solid 4
posts.html:

His ultimate is not a bomb, which makes him less interesting. I think he is better than Sarkhan the Mad while focusing on the same areas: Card advantage, creature creating, burn

All in all a solid 4

posts.post_content:
I stared down a rather horrifying power of this guy. The opp played [Plague Myr](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Plague Myr) with [Vector Asp](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vector Asp) and [Ichorclaw myr](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ichorclaw myr). Speed into an [Inexorable Tide](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Inexorable Tide) (most overlooked card ever?) used contagion clasp for removing a creature, played 3 infect artifact, made an Ichorclaw Myr a 5/5 that gets buffed for blocking, and didnt even care about that they could kill me just from having so many artifacts with Tezzy's ultimate, and proliferate back on counters if I removed any.   
  
Purely Horrifying.

posts.post_content:
no idea how many times abilities like his first ability bite you, you see 2 of the cards you need for a combo, and can only fetch 1...  
  
although it is a great ability if you just want to trigger his last, there are countless ways to generate artefacts quick and fast when you need it, and countless ways with artefacts to generate mana when you need it. so building round that should be quick and easy,   
  
although i like the idea of liquimetal coating him and using his second ability to make him a 5/5 artefact creature planes walker, the problem i have with that is you have made him way more vulnerable, the sweet thing with PW is they are so hard to get rid of compared to artefacts and creatures, is just a waste, straight away he is on 2 loyalty and can be destroyed relatively easily, he will die from battle-cry and most pump and infect, destroy creature spells (although he is black) , destroy artefact spells, all your opponent needs is 2 2/2's and he is gone, you have wasted the use of hi... Posted By: Ava_Adore (3/16/2011 7:35:57 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: Absolutely insanely good card for artifact centric decks. The +1 isn't just card advantage for positive loyalty; it may as well read "super ponder once per turn for a 4 mana investment". The -1 is nice and works well for both offense and defense, and the ultimate is capable of turning an even game on its head, and pulling you back into one where you're on the back foot.
posts.html:

The -1 is nice and works well for both offense and defense, and the ultimate is capable of turning an even game on its head, and pulling you back into one where you're on the back foot.
